scene_description: In this scene, multiple vehicles are present ahead, with two cars clearly
visible in the adjacent lane and moving in the same direction. The road is
partially constrained by orange construction barriers and cones on the right
side, which limit the available lanes. Lane markings are visible and suggest two
lanes in this section of the road. There are traffic lights visible further
ahead, currently showing red. Construction work appears to be ongoing on the
right side, as indicated by cranes in the background and additional construction
barriers along the road. A few pedestrians can be seen walking on the sidewalk
to the left, near a large building. Overall, this is an urban area with active
construction and fair traffic presence.
